article.description: Penn, Murray help Texas Southern beat Wiley 113-96
article.headline: Penn, Murray help Texas Southern beat Wiley 113-96
article.linkText: Penn, Murray help Texas Southern beat Wiley 113-96
article.story: HOUSTON -- Ray Penn had 29 points and 11 assists, Aaric Murray had 24 points, 10 rebounds and 10 blocks as Texas Southern beat Wiley 113-96 on Monday. Law Johnson-Danner scored 22 points, Jose Rodriguez added 18 and Aaron Clayborn 14 for the Tigers (2-0), who shot 55 percent from the field (38 for 69). Texas Southern was also 11 for 27 (41 percent) on 3-pointers, led by Johnson-Danner's 6-for-8 and Penn's 4-for-8 efforts. Penn also shot 11 for 11 on free throws. Corey Blake scored 38 points on 16-for-26 shooting to lead the Wildcats (0-1). Phillip Miller had 13 points, DeAndre Smith scored 10 and Henry Sidney had 15 assists. Wiley shot 49 percent (38 for 77) and was outrebounded 44-28. Texas Southern led 58-49 at halftime.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
